snippet.title: Arcade Game: Great Guns (1983 Stern Electronics)
snippet.description:
A lightgun game where you shooting different objects in different target scenes. The series of target racks can get increasingly competitive making it challenging for the players depending on the skill. 

Gameplay starts at 6:43

Note: Used infinite bullet cheat after down to the last life. The game is endless so I quit afterwards.
